title: Seeking Vengeance
description:
Her lies are as sweet as his obsession.
He caught me spying on my enemies, but instead of betraying me, this dark-eyed stranger set his sights on seduction.He breaks down my walls with smoothly spoken Italian.Taunts me with his wicked promises.He says he wants to help. To give me a future, freedom, and, most of all, vengeance.Problem is, he has no idea who I really am.I’m not someone he should fall for.I’m a liability.An outcast.A threat.He just doesn’t know it yet.***I’m infatuated. She’s a pretty little liar who wrapped me around her finger.I’ll stop at nothing to learn her secrets.I’ll deceive. Manipulate. Scheme.Walking away isn’t an option, even though I’m not someone she should succumb to.I’m a predator.A criminal.The villain.I’ll give her the revenge she craves. I’ll do whatever it takes.But this woman is mine.I won’t give her up.She just doesn’t know it yet.From bestselling author, Eden Summers, comes a seductively thrilling romance destined to leave you breathless.
author: Eden Summers
